00020 // This file contains all definitions which need to be after
00021 // everything else. In an ideal world, this would live in a
00022 // .c file, but we want them to be inlinable.
00023 
00024 inline void Trigger::propagate(DomainDelta domain_data)
00025 {
00026     constraint->propagate(info, domain_data); 
00027 }
00028 
00029 inline void Trigger::full_propagate()
00030 {
00031     constraint->full_propagate();
